data.title: SR Software Engineer Resume Temple, Texas
meta_keywords: iPhone Simulator iPhone Framework: Cocoa Touch
data.meta_description: 12+ years Professional Services/External Consulting 12+ years Relational Databases & Tools Oracle 8 - 10g, SQL Plus, SqlServer 2000 & 2005, PLSql, DB2, MySQL, HP Image/Image SQL, MongoDB 4yrs Microsoft Dynamics AX installations & configurations 5yrs of Salesforce.com implementation, administration, and cloud consulting, Apex and Visualforce (Salesforce.com proprietary languages) 4yrs Site Core and Digital Marketing 12+ ERP (Oracle, SAP, A2000) 12+ years HP-UX, Unix, MPE, IBM 9xOS, AI
data.text:
SUMMARY:

12+ years Professional Services/External Consulting

12+ years Relational Databases & Tools: Oracle 8 - 10g, SQL Plus, SqlServer 2000 & 2005, PLSql, DB2, MySQL, HP Image/Image SQL, MongoDB

4yrs Microsoft Dynamics AX installations & configurations

5yrs of Salesforce.com implementation, administration, and cloud consulting, Apex and Visualforce (Salesforce.com proprietary languages)

4yrs Site Core and Digital Marketing

12+ ERP (Oracle, SAP, A2000)

12+ years HP-UX, Unix, MPE, IBM 9xOS, AIX. MVS, Sun Solaris 9/10

10+ years Windows 98/2k/NT, Advanced Server, Visual Basic 4.0/5.0/6.0

10+ years Visual Safe Source, MS Project, MS Office

10+ years Web Development: PHP, C#, C++ HTML, DHTML, CSS 2.1/3, VB.NET, PHP 4.0/5.3, Ajax, ASP, ASPX, Java JavaScript, XML, VBScript, Apache Struts, .NET, Ruby on Rails, Python

8+ years Visual Studio, Visio, Erwin, Ms Project, Flash, Action Scripts 3.0

8+ years Mobile Development: AppForge Mobile VB, Crossfire 5.0, Windows CE

8+ years with Big Data, Hadoop, machine learning algorithms, ETL processes

5+ years experience OpenEdge ABL, Speedscript, Progress 4GL, ECMAScript (ECMA-262)

3+ years Confidential Ajax Loader, KML, GeoIPCoder, Yahoo UI Services, MVC, MS Dynamics AX

3+ years Amazon EC2 Server management and hosting, Puppet, Chef, and Amazon CloudInit

3+ years NAV, MS Sharepoint Development, MS Silverlight, ArcGIS Explorer, Remedy, Kony, COBOL, Microsoft AX Dynamics/Axapta Developer, SiteCore, AX/AXAPTA, Cognos, Angular JS

3+ years Android & iPhone App development

TECHNICAL SKILLS:

IOS Skills: Ecplise SDK, Java, J2EE, Objective C, C#, C++, C.

Operating Systems: Mac OSx, iPhone OS, Windows

Tools: X-Code, Interface Builder, iPhone Simulator iPhone Framework: Cocoa Touch, Foundation Framework.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:

Confidential

SR Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Worked with a team of 10 to build this system.

Utilized Python Django and Angular.js

Wrote RESTful web services

Test Driven Development

Worked with Mongo DB

Confidential

SR Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

DBA activities include PHP, documentation and front end HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Jquery, Scala and node.js

Test Driven Development

Front end and back end webservices in node.js

Management of SQL DB

Confidential

SR Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

DBA activities include front end HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Jquery mobile, Kendo UI, Phonegap

Java Development, iOS & Android development

Angular/Node.js

RoR Development

Test Driven Development

Confidential

SR Software Engineer

Responsibilities:

Developed backend in Python (Django)

Management of Oracle DB

Managed other developers as a team lead

QA/Testing

Confidential

Architect/Developer

Responsibilities:

Hands-on lead of the team that designs, builds and manages our internal systems, custom applications, ecommerce sites and mobile apps.

Influence all web design, internal development, mobile apps and third-party integration activities.

For new development, I stress the use of the latest Web 2.0 technologies: Wire frame design modeling, MVC components and extensive Ajax style UI, to deploy sites and apps that are both functional and intuitive to achieve the best possible experience for our customers.

Team lead for iOS, Android, and cross platform mobile apps.

Helping a company transition their legacy infrastructure to the cloud with the goals of improving performance, reliability, and automation.

Created detailed insight into all aspects of business operations through painstaking integration of Graphite, Logstash, Sensu, and Chef

Automated legacy infrastructure in the interim while working through

Architected and implemented automated cloud infrastructure using Chef

Reduced the time to on-board new developers by writing a Sinatra app to automate all common new-developer tasks like setting up their desktops, virtual machines, git accounts, and development environment.

Cloud systems design, implementation and troubleshooting (AWS, Rackspace, Confidential, Azure)

Cloud security best practice and policy evaluation and implementation

Automation technology implementation (Opscode Chef, Hashi corp Terraform, et al.

Confidential

Web Developer

Responsibilities:

Implemented and maintained an advanced version of m.yp.com for WebKit-based web browsers.

Utilized hand-written JavaScript, CSS3 and HTML5 with an emphasis on performance, scalability, search engine optimization and a positive user experience.

Contributed to Ruby backend code and assisted with key user-interface and architectural decisions.

Led the development of the first native mobile apps used with yp.

Built the front-end and contributed to Ruby backend for m.buzz.com and m.keen.com.

Built the front-end for Yellow Page's new mobile web site, m.yp.com.

Utilized graceful degradation and progressive enhancement to support all mobile web browsers from iPhone and Android to low-end feature phones.

Confidential

Migration Practice Manager

Responsibilities:

Migrated Hospital Administration system to Unix and converted unstructured collection of index files into an Oracle database.

Performed extensive performance on the database achieve the sub-second response time required by the client

Key Technology: Unix, Oracle 8.1, Micro Focus Cobol, VB, Html, JavaScript

Confidential - Temple, Texas

Responsibilities:

Migrated Billing, Patient Accounting and Pharmacy systems to Unix and converted a network style data structure to an Oracle database.

Key Technology: Unix, Oracle 9, PL/SQL, Micro Focus Cobol, VB

Confidential

Responsibilities:

Modernized and re-hosted legacy ERP, Aviation, Order Processing, Sales and Human Resources systems for a large steel manufacturer.

Key Technology: Unix, Oracle 9i, PL/SQL, AcuCobol, VB.net, Html

Confidential - Akron, Ohio

Responsibilities:

Led a project team to help this large automotive parts retailer modernize their internal sales and order tracking systems.

Implemented handheld RF tracking devices to track product movement through the warehouse during the fulfillment process and produced the final manifest to Fedx for shipment.

Key Technology: Linux, Oracle 11 (RAC deployment), PL/SQL, AcuCobol, VB.net, Html, JavaScript

Confidential - Seattle, Washington

Responsibilities:
